DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate capacity 6-week treatment neuromuscular electrical stimulation improve walking individual whose mobility compromise multiple sclerosis .
DOC.brief_title: Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation Mobility Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly assign one two study arm . Those one arm receive treatment narrow stimulus pulse ( 0.4 m ) arm receive wide stimulus pulse ( 1 m ) . The electrical stimulation deliver Vectra Genisys System .
DOC.criteria: Able read , understand , speak English ensure safe participation project Difficulties walk On stable dos Ampyra , provigil , symptomatictreating medication No systemic steroid within last 30 day Not currently exercise 2x/wk Able arrange transportation laboratory Provide inform consent , include willingness randomly assign one two group Documented MSrelated relapse last 3 month Medical diagnosis condition consider absolute relative contraindication participate exercise training , major renal , pulmonary , hepatic , cardiac , gastrointestinal , HIV , cancer ( treat basal cell cancer ) , neurological disorder , pregnancy Poorly control diabetes mellitus hypertension History seizure disorder Alcohol dependence abuse ( â‰¥2 drinks/day ) , present history ( last 6 month ) drug abuse Inability attend exercise session 3 day per week 6 week
